DESCRIPTION: Use to refill the Ammo to full.
At the beginning of the turn, Block equal to Shield does not removed. Shield cannot be higher than the current Block.
Some cards require Ammo. Empty Ammo Slot can be refilled by reloading.
When you put this card into your hand, its value is reduced by 1. If the value is 0, that effect is also applied.
When a buffed enemy dies, you gain that much gold.
Gain Block equal to the value when reloading.
